                                                 Expression[] exp,

        Decrypt a string that's been put through layers of DM encryption
        Parameters:
        text - Text that's been Encoded
        layers - Layers that the text has been through
        exp - Expressions that the code has been through
        keys - Key array that solves the expression
        Returns:
        decrypted Text

                                                 int[][] keys)

        Parameters:
        text - Text that will be encrypted
        layers - Layers that the text will go through

        keys - Key array that solves the expression
        Returns:
